summary: Completed comprehensive testing of all new Afroboost features: black background #000000, Globe icon language selector (FR/EN/DE), persistent neon borders on selected elements, violet/pink gradient payment button with pulsation, secret coach access via 3 rapid clicks, coach modal with neon styling, Concept & Visuel tab with dynamic media preview, and all coach dashboard functionality. All features working perfectly.
